document.heading: Inpatient Health Examination of Youth Act of 1980

history.narrative: Law 3-140, the “Inpatient Health Examination of Youth Act of 1980,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-220, which was referred to the Committee on Human Resources. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 29, 1980, and September 16, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 2, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-261 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
